## Summary

Brief description of the feature request.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? What is the current limitation?

## Proposed Solution

Describe your proposed solution in detail.

## Alternative Solutions

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Cases

Describe specific use cases where this feature would be valuable.

## Implementation Details

If you have thoughts on implementation:

- **Architecture changes**: Any required architectural changes
- **API changes**: New or modified APIs
- **Performance impact**: Expected performance implications
- **Breaking changes**: Will this break existing functionality?

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or examples that help illustrate the feature request.

## Checklist

- [ ] This feature would benefit other users
- [ ] I've considered backward compatibility
- [ ] I've thought about testing requirements
- [ ] I've considered documentation updates
